author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: فی‌الحقیقه اگر آفتاب عدل از سحاب ظلم فارغ شود ارض غیر ارض مشاهده گردد
translation: There can be no doubt whatever that if the daystar of justice, which the clouds of tyranny have obscured, were to shed its light upon men, the face of the earth would be completely transformed.
